name: 陳怡靜
objective:
本學期將從詩的背景與脈絡介紹，並列舉幾位著名詩人的詩為例。教學目標為學習詩的特色並欣賞其美感。將教授如何從詩的形式，提出其意境及修辭，並進一步運用。
與其說是一門中文課，不如說是心理與生活的課程。且從歷史人物的生命，借鏡於個人生活，在欣賞與反思中，尋出自己的人生道路。請慎選此門課程，以開放、探索的心情，其間將可能反轉你的生涯。
本課程僅供已通過考試之僑生，若未通過考試而選，恐無法由系統選入。
Fist semester : forms and rhetoric. Release your real feeling.
This semester will introduce the background and context of poetry, and give examples of poems by several famous poets. The teaching goal is to learn the characteristics of poetry and appreciate its beauty. It will teach how to present the artistic conception and rhetoric from the form of poetry and further apply them.
It is not so much a Chinese class as it is a psychology and life course. And learn from the lives of historical figures and personal lives, and find your own life path through appreciation and reflection. Please choose this course carefully and with an open and exploratory attitude, as it may turn your life around.
This course is only for overseas students who have passed the exam. If you do not pass the exam, you may not be able to be selected through the system.
